kickstart.description: Build labels for a Rocks cluster
kickstart.changelog:
$Log: labels.xml,v $ Revision 1.1 2007/12/10 21:28:33 bruno the base roll now contains several elements from the HPC roll, thus making the HPC roll optional.
this also includes changes to help build and configure VMs for V.
